001package example;
002
003public class BigAndSmall extends Object
004{
005        public static void main(String[] arguments)
006        {
007                Double aDouble = Math.random();
008                String aString = new String();
009
010                if(aDouble >= 0.5){
011                        aString = "Big";
012                }else {
013                        aString = "Small";
014                }
015
016                System.out.println("value:" + aDouble);
017                System.out.println("result:" + aString);
018        }
019}
